Posts.EditableText: My heart broke a little when I discovered that when I click "Preview" in the Squiffy Editor, the "Plays" counter adds one play. Here I thought people were playing my game, or at least giving it a peek, but it was just me editing. Could that be changed, please? Maybe make the author's own plays not count?

Posts.EditableText: The Preview button doesn't increase the play count. Only clicking the "Play online" button from the game's public listing page counts.
